paper_abstract: The ultimate goal of Web prefetching is to improve the quality of service on the Web. Previous studies in speculative prefetching focus on building prediction algorithms for the purpose of Web prefetching accuracy. This paper presents a theoretical analytical model on Web prefetching, based on which, different Web prefetching scheme can be developed. The discussion tries to describe a generic prefetching algorithm and provide implementation basis for Web speculative prefetching.
paper_title: An analytical model for Web prefetching
